variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identification information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: NOB3
variable.description: B3. General information. Place of death

variable.name: NOB4
variable.description: B4. General information. Patient pronounced dead by physician

variable.name: NOC1
variable.description: C1. Medical history and diagnosis. Antecedent medicinal history prior to death
variable.value: Hospitalized for illness, critically ill - death expected
Hospitalized for illness, death not expected
Receiving treatment in emergency room for acute illness or trauma
Home under medical treatment for illmess

variable.name: NOD1B
variable.description: D1b. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Autopsy pending

variable.name: NOD1C
variable.description: D1c. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Autopsy report: preliminary or final

variable.name: NOD1D
variable.description: D1d. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Reason autopsy was not performed

variable.name: NOD3
variable.description: D3. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Death certificate enclosed

variable.name: NOD4
variable.description: D4. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Autopsy report enclosed

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identification information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identification information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: NOB1
variable.description: B1. General information. Deidentified date of death

variable.name: NOB2
variable.description: B2. General information. Deidentified date clinic learned of death

variable.name: NOD1A
variable.description: D1a. Post mortem information and diagnosis. Deidentified date autopsy was performed
